function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases in the built environment","Impact":"Risk of illness and transmission to employees and guests","Mitigation":"Implementing strict hygiene protocols and maintaining social distancing measures","Technologies":"Contactless technologies, air filtration systems, and UV disinfection","People":"Employees, guests, and visitors","Owner":"Management and health and safety personnel"}]}
